content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a private landlord seeking the highest price, let me start with suggesting an initial rental amount of 1500 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating further should you find it agreeable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is indeed very nice. But I think the price is a little bit high. I propose 1200 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this prime location apartment is significantly higher than your proposed 1200 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. Considering the quality of the apartment and its location, I propose 1350 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: After contemplating your revised offer, I agree to the price of 1350 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
